dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ha ha ha! Oh my god, seriously? You know what? This is just... ridiculous!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ha ha ha! Oh my god, seriously? You know what? This is just... ridiculous!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ridiculous? What's ridiculous about it? It's about protecting the animals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ridiculous? What's ridiculous about it? It's about protecting the animals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's like, uh, it's about control, isn't it? Swans are back, everyone's excited, they wanna feed them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's like, uh, it's about control, isn't it? Swans are back, everyone's excited, they wanna feed them!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It became known that swans have returned to the Almaty Botanical Garden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wanna feed them unhealthy food? The article clearly says experts control their diet. It's for their health, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wanna feed them unhealthy food? The article clearly says experts control their diet. It's for their health, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have a team of professionals who care about the health and well-being of the pond's inhabitants. Specialists strictly control their diet, providing the necessary quantity and quality of food at the right time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, "experts." Come on. People want to connect with nature! That's what a botanical garden is for, isn't it? To, like, experience it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, experts. Come on. People want to connect with nature! That's what a botanical garden is for, isn't it? To, like, experience it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Experience it by harming them? They literally said "uncontrolled quantities" can lead to health problems. It's not about connection, it's about responsibility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Experience it by harming them? They literally said uncontrolled quantities can lead to health problems. It's not about connection, it's about responsibility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unhealthy food in uncontrolled quantities can lead to health problems for swans and fish," the organization reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Responsibility? It's a bit much, isn't it? They're swans! They've been around forever. A little bread isn't going to kill them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Responsibility? It's a bit much, isn't it? They're swans! They've been around forever. A little bread isn't going to kill them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A little bread? That's exactly the problem! It's not natural food for them, Host_A, it fills them up with junk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A little bread? That's exactly the problem! It's not natural food for them, Host_A, it fills them up with junk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the fish! It says the fish are like, swimming up asking to be fed! They want it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the fish! It says the fish are like, swimming up asking to be fed! They want it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The fish, on the contrary, swim close and seem to ask to be fed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They seem to ask. That doesn't mean it's good for them. It's instinct, not, uh, a nutritional request.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They seem to ask. That doesn't mean it's good for them. It's instinct, not, uh, a nutritional request.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The fish, on the contrary, swim close and seem to ask to be fed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So we're just supposed to, what, stand there and watch? Not interact at all? That's just... I don't know, depressing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So we're just supposed to, what, stand there and watch? Not interact at all? That's just... I don't know, depressing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You interact by admiring them, by appreciating their beauty without, um, poisoning them! It's not complicated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You interact by admiring them, by appreciating their beauty without, um, poisoning them! It's not complicated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, because our "professionals" know everything. People have fed ducks and swans for centuries, Host_B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, because our professionals know everything. People have fed ducks and swans for centuries, Host_B.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have a team of professionals who care about the health and well-being of the pond's inhabitants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And now we know better! We understand animal nutrition. This isn't, like, the dark ages anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now we know better! We understand animal nutrition. This isn't, like, the dark ages anymore.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh. I just think it takes away from the whole point of a public garden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh. I just think it takes away from the whole point of a public garden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it protects the animals, which is, uh, the actual point. Full stop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it protects the animals, which is, uh, the actual point. Full stop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Botanical Garden also asked to "protect the swans and fish and create comfortable conditions for them."
